title: Manage your iOS content seamlessly with AnyTrans, now just $19.97
content:
Macworld

Whether you’re updating your iPhone or you’ve got too many iOS devices to keep track of, making sure all of your data is accessible across your iOS devices is of paramount importance. AnyTrans® helps you do it, and now, through October 31st, you can get a lifetime subscription for only $19.97 (reg. $79).

AnyTrans® works with iPhone, iPad, iTunes, iPod, and iCloud, giving you a single resource to manage data across devices effortlessly. You can converge and back up all your media, including photos, videos, music, iMessages, books, Safari history, voice memos, and much more.

The platform offers one-click transfers, making it simple to move all data from your old iPhone to your new device, like the iPhone 15. Users can even transfer their WhatsApp chats and attachments from their smartphones and merge them into one thread. Non-purchased music can also be transferred from iPhone to iPhone in one click.

Find out why TechRadar writes, “AnyTrans allows for greater flexibility when it comes to two-way file synchronization and far better phone management options.”

Now through October 31st at 11:59pm Pacific, you can get a lifetime subscription to AnyTrans®, the One-Stop Content Manager for iOS, for just $19.97. No coupon necessary!
